MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL30 postcode area of  Llandudno, affecting all the ODD numbers from 47-83 and all the EVEN numbers from 88-114 Maenan road. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.30PM due to a fault on the underground cable network. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.08PM on 15th October 2020.
